title: Boosting immunotherapy efficacy: Empowering the Potency of Dendritic cells loaded with breast cancer lysates through CTLA-4 suppression
content:
Publication date: 30 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 18

Author(s): Mohammad Bakhshivand, Javad Masoumi, Farid Ghorbaninezhad, Leili Aghebati-Maleki, Dariush Shanebandi, Siamak Sandoghchian Shotorbani, Farhad Jadidi-Niaragh, Amir Baghbanzadeh, Nima Hemmat, Elham Baghbani, Amir Ghaffari, Behzad Baradaran
